alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Dixon (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 9:11PM CST until December 02 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Nebraska and central, east central, south central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 6 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds coupled with falling snow Friday may result in periods of reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
